product.title: Pungan hot roller clips 16pcs Hot Curler Clips for Most Sized Rollers,2.76"X1"X0.12"
product.description:
Description

It can be applied for curling hair at home or in the salon. No matter you have thin or thick long hair, it will help to give you the big curls, voluminous waves, and fullness you want. Designed to make your desired curly hairs, just enjoy the DIY process in a more easy and convenient way.

Features

-Color:As Shown
-Material:Stainless steel
-Size:7.00X2.54X0.30cm/2.75X1.00X0.12in
-Use these clips to fix and hold hot rollers or hot curlers for achieving better effect.
-Sufficient quantity for you to use, replace or share with your friends or family.
-Suitable for home DIY use and salon shop. It will not damage your hair.
-Apply these hot roller clips to make your curls more neat and beautiful, perfect to use at home or hair salon.
-Practical hairdressing styling tools for women, men, girls. Bring you a lot of conveniences.
